means: 有趣的，好玩的，逗人笑的

sentence.Network_en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

sentence.Network_en: The book is full of amusing sidelights on his family background.
sentence.Network_cn: 书中有很多关于他家庭背景的趣闻。

sentence.Network_en: He was witty, amusing and gifted with a sharp business brain.
sentence.Network_cn: 他机智诙谐，具有敏锐的商业头脑。

有趣的英语单词_百度知道 ... Job-hop： 跳槽有趣 amusing 有趣的 amusive.
新版新概念第二册　单词表--koflfy ... occasion n.场合 amusing a.好笑的，有趣的 experience n.经历.
新编大学英语单词表第二册 - 新月空中英语 ... ambient 周围的,包围着的 amusing 有趣的,引人发笑的 analytical 分析的,解析的.

list.abs: 商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... fair 市场 amusement park 游乐园 ghost train 魔鬼列车.
... 1. space museum 太空博物院 2. amusement park 游乐场 3. water park 水上乐园.
建筑专业英语名词 - 豆丁网 ... amplitude of vibration 振幅 amusement center 娱乐中心 amusement park 公共游乐场.
原因非常简单:为了逃避娱乐税(Amusement Tax)的缴纳。这一税收始于魏玛共和国时期。当时,如果在放映一部未经电影审查委员会定级的故事片之前加映一部已经评级的.
从零开始学语法：一起来学反身代词_英语网 ... for oneself 替自己 amuse oneself 自娱自乐 help oneself to 随便吃.

entry.tran: 逗人笑的；有乐趣的；好笑的
entry.def: Someone or something that is amusing makes you laugh or smile.

example.ex: He had a terrific sense of humour and could be very amusing...
example.tran: 他极具幽默感，很会逗人发笑。

example.ex: They recounted amusing stories about their first sexual experiences.
example.tran: 他们讲述了他们第一次性经历的趣事。

sentences.sentence: "an amusing film with a steady stream of pranks and pratfalls"
"it would have been laughable if it hadn't hurt so much"

auth_sentence.content: He was full of really entertaining and amusing stories.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was full of really entertaining and amusing stories.

auth_sentence.content: It was amusing but for me contained few epiphanies.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was amusing but for me contained few epiphanies.

auth_sentence.content: The next day, we had an amusing episode.

Sentence.sentence: LOL has evolved into something much subtler and sophisticated and is used even when nothing is remotely amusing.

means.word_mean: 有趣的, 好玩的, 逗人笑的,好笑的

sentences.en: His wit made even troubles seem amusing.
sentences.cn: 他的风趣能使麻烦事也变得似乎有趣。

jushi.english: That gave rise to some amusing misunderstanding.
jushi.chinese: 这件事产生了一些好笑的误解。
